T.COMP_CODE || T.TEMP_CODE || T.LINE_NO || T.SUB_LINE_NO AS concatKey, T.COMP_CODE, T.SUB_LINE_NO, T.TEMP_CODE, T.LINE_NO, T.CRITERIA_CODE, FF.CRI_TYPE, CT.COMPONENT, CT.CRITERIA_TYPE_CODE, CT.TABLE1 AS TABLE_NAME1, CT.TABLE2 AS TABLE_NAME2, FF.BRIEF_DESC_ENG AS CRITERIA_NAME, FF.CRI_LINE_GL AS CRI_LINE_GL, (SELECT V.VALUE_DESC FROM SYS_PARAM_LOV_TRANS V WHERE V.LOV_TYPE_ID = 5 AND V.VALUE_CODE = T.OPERATOR AND #{LANG_CODE} = V.LANG_CODE) AS OPERATOR_NAME, (CASE WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'ECS' AND COALESCE(T.CODE1,0) NOT IN (0) ) THEN TO_CHAR(T.CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'PDC') THEN TO_CHAR(T.CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'CIT') THEN TO_CHAR(T.CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'CTY') THEN TO_CHAR(T.CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('AMT', 'AGL')) THEN TO_CHAR(T.OPERATOR) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'MAT') THEN TO_CHAR(T.MAT_DATE) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'ATT' OR FF.CRI_TYPE = 'FDT') THEN TO_CHAR(T.TRS_ASSET_TYPE) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('DTN', 'DPR', 'MBK','OM')) THEN TO_CHAR(T.OPERATOR1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('AMT', 'AGL')) THEN TO_CHAR(T.OPERATOR) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'DCT') THEN TO_CHAR(T.TYPE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'WCL' OR FF.CRI_TYPE = 'WOD' OR (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'SMT' /* AND CODE1_VISIBLE = 0*/ )) THEN TO_CHAR(CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'SEC') THEN TO_CHAR(SECURITY_CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'CZT') THEN TO_CHAR(T.COLL_PER_TYPE) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'DCS') THEN TO_CHAR(T.DEBIT_CREDIT_IND) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'TOT') THEN TO_CHAR(T.TOTAL_AMT_SIGN) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('DTN', 'DPR')) THEN TO_CHAR(T.DEAL_TENURE) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'SU') THEN T.SOURCE_USAGES WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'CBK') THEN T.CBK_CIF_TYPE WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'SCT') THEN T.SECURITY_LISTED WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'CCL') THEN TO_CHAR(T.CATEGORY) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'RES') THEN T.RESIDENT WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'MBK') THEN T.OPERATOR
WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'SCL') THEN TO_CHAR(T.SECURITY_CLASS)
WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'GLT') THEN T.GL_TERM ELSE TO_CHAR(T.CODE1) END) AS CODE1, (CASE WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('SEC')) THEN T.SECURITY_CODE2 ELSE T.CODE2 END) AS CODE2, (CASE WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('AMT','MBK','AGL','OM')) THEN TO_CHAR(T.AMOUNT) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ( 'DPR')) THEN T.OPERATOR1 WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('AMT', 'AGL')) THEN T.OPERATOR WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'PER' AND FF.CRI_LINE_GL = 'L') THEN TO_CHAR(T.PERCENTAGE) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'WCL' OR FF.CRI_TYPE = 'WOD') THEN TO_CHAR(CODE1) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE IN ('DTN', 'DPR')) THEN TO_CHAR(T.DEAL_TENURE) WHEN (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'MBK') THEN T.DATE_TYPE END) AS VALUE1, (CASE WHEN (T.OPERATOR <> '>' AND (FF.CRI_TYPE = 'AMT' OR FF.CRI_TYPE = 'OM' OR FF.CRI_TYPE='MBK') AND T.OPERATOR <> '<' AND T.OPERATOR <> '>=' AND T.OPERATOR <> '<=') THEN TO_CHAR(T.AMOUNT2) END) AS VALUE2, T.OPERATOR, T.OPERATOR1, T.DATE_TYPE, T.GENDER, T.SECURITY_CODE1,
T.SECURITY_CLASS,
(CASE WHEN T.INCLUDE='N' THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END )AS INCLUDE
